comment._content: This is a wonderful historical photo.   Instant news communication has come a long way.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: LOC -- this was taken at New York's Polo Grounds, not Philly's Shibe Park. Compare the image with three others from the same place and time, posted earlier: www.flickr.com/search/?q=telegraphers&w=8623220@N02

comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: (It also says "Polo Grounds" on the left margin of the photo.)
